abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by electronic musician Amon Tobin at the Brooklyn Masonic Temple.
snippet: The electronic musician Amon Tobin played with geometric forms, pulsating colors and a Continuum Fingerboard in “Isam” at the Brooklyn Masonic Temple.
lead_paragraph: The electronic musician Amon Tobin played with geometric forms, pulsating colors and a Continuum Fingerboard in “Isam” at the Brooklyn Masonic Temple.

headline.main: High-Tech Experiment From Inside the Box
headline.print_headline: High-Tech Experiment From Inside the Box
headline.seo: Amon Tobin’s ‘Isam’ at Brooklyn Masonic Temple - Review
